Epidemiological exercises in R Lucky Mehra 2019-08-02 Prerequisites To run these exercises, you will need to install the latest version of R (https://cloud.r-project.org/) and RStudio (https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/) on your computer. Please click on the above mentioned links to go to the download pages of R and RStudio. These exercises are a work in progress, and are an attempt to translate SAS code written by Tim Todd into R.
